info.description: a simple nanoblogging platform as PWA built on go-app framework
info.title: littr

get.summary: Get real-time posts event stream (SSE stream)

author.description: Author is the back key to the user originally posting that poll.

id.description: ID is an unique poll's identifier.

option_one.description: OptionOne is the answer numero uno.

option_three.description: OptionThree is the answer numero tres.

option_two.description: OptionTwo is the answer numero dos.

question.description: Question is to describe the main purpose of such poll.

reaction_count.description: ReactionCount counts the number of item's reactions.

timestamp.description: Timestamp is an UNIX timestamp indication the poll's creation time; should be identical to the upstream post's Timestamp.

voted_list.description: VodeList is the list of user nicknames voted on such poll already.

content.description: Content describes the very content of such poll's option/answer.

counter.description: Counter hold a number of votes being committed to such option.

about.description: About is a description string of such user.

active.description: Active boolean indicates an activated user's account.

app_bg_mode.description: AppBgMode string defines the colour mode of the app's background (light vs dark).

avatar_url.description: AvatarURL is an URL to the user's custom profile picture.

color.description: Color is the user's UI color scheme.

email.description: Email is a primary user's e-mail address.

flow_list.description: FlowList is a string map of users, which posts should be added to one's flow page.

flow_toggle.description: FlowToggle is a single implementation of FlowList.

full_name.description: FullName is the "genuine" name of such user.

gdpr.description:
GDPR consent, set to true because it is noted on the registration page so. No user data should
be saved if the boolean is false.

last_active_time.description: LastLoginTime is an UNIX timestamp of the last action performed by such user.

last_login_time.description: LastLoginTime is an UNIX timestamp of the last user's successful log-in.

live_mode.description: LiveMode is a feature allowing to show notifications about new posts

local_time_mode.description: LocalTimeMode is a feature to show any post's datetime in the local time according to the client's/user's device setting.

nickname.description: Nickname is a login name of such user.

passphrase.description: Passphrase is a hashed pass phrase string (binary form).

passphrase_hex.description: PassphraseHex is a hashed pass phrase string (hexadecimal alphanumberic form).

private.description: Private boolean indicates a private user's account.

registered_time.description: RegisteredTime is an UNIX timestamp of the user's registration.

request_list.description: RequestList is a map of account requested to add this user to their flow --- used with the Private property.

shade_list.description: ShadeList is a map of account/users to be shaded (soft-blocked) from following.

tags.description: Tags is an array of possible roles and other various attributes assigned to such user.
